entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the morning then steady.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
